articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.title: NZXT responds to damning Gamers Nexus video accusing it of running a "predatory, evil" rental scam - TechSpot
articles.description: NZXT's Flex program essentially lets people rent a gaming PC, meaning they don't pay the one-off high price associated with these machines. However, as we mentioned at...
articles.content: A hot potato: NZXT has responded to a damning video from YouTube channel Gamers Nexus that accuses the PC hardware giant of running a "predatory, evil rental computer scam." The program in question i… [+2509 chars]
